thread.title: Wall of rubbish left as traveller slum is cleared in Paris | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Wall of rubbish left as traveller slum is cleared in Paris | Daily Mail Online

author: Julian Robinson For Mailonline
title: Wall of rubbish left as traveller slum is cleared in Paris | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Giant 30ft mound of rubbish is left piled next to ramshackle huts after Roma travellers are moved on in latest bid to end the rise of Paris's shanty towns Riot police launched an operation to clear slum near Porte de la Chapelle in the north of the French capital Huge wall of plastic sacks filled with rubbish left at the site, along disused 'Petite Ceinture' circular railway About 80 people were evacuated from the site a year after 400 were moved out of the same shantytown Published: 13:04 GMT, 28 February 2017 | Updated: 13:10 GMT, 28 February 2017 195 shares
